companyName: Direxion Daily FTSE Europe Bull 3x Shares
description:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 300% of the daily performance of the FTSE Developed Europe All Cap Index.
 The fund invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus borrowing for investment purposes) in securities of the index, exchange-traded funds ("ETFs") that track the index and other financial instruments that provide daily leveraged exposure to the index or ETFs that track the index. The index is a market capitalization weighted index that is designed to measure the equity market performance of large-, mid- and small-cap companies in developed markets in Europe. The fund is non-diversified.
